(Yo, dude, they are firing at Hell Beast, Arachnia, and Gremlin with Smart =
Guns, and you've just been attacked, and I know that you have.)

::Four Nig=
htmares::

    They saw that they were out numbered and started to book it =
out of there. They were hit many times and were going to need extensive CR =
time. But they would survive. Praetorian and Jynx ran with them, living to =
fight another day.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: JP3884@... 
=
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, December 17, 2000 8:03 PM
  Subje=
ct: Re: Hell beast cannot survive against 4 bots


  Tankkor, Inferno, Para=
lysis, and Aerostreak send a squad of missles and 
  dischrges at the Night=
mares, giving Hell Beast and Aracnia a chance to get 
  away. 
        "Idi=
ots. Kill them!" Hell Beast commands, as he, and the other bots 
  begin to=
 massacre the Nightmares. 

        "Excellent. We have them on the run. No=
w we just have to sweep those 
  Nightmares out of the way." Megatron smile=
s. "Nighteyes, Aquarious, go and 
  assist them." 

        Ominous Primes =
watched Hell Beast get jumped. It was a nice sight to 
  see his archenemy =
in such agony. 
        "I do believe theyre in my old base...." He murmure=
d to himself. 

        Rampage climed on shore, whick was an iceburg. He d=
idnt see Demise 
  anywhere, but at least he was somewhat ok. He raised his=
 grappling hook, and 
  climed back up the cliff. Seeing the Nightmares att=
acking, he joined his team 
  in the slaughter. 
        eGroups Sponsor
